name: Plaza Premium Wien
description: Located in Vienna, 3.5 km from Vienna Main Railway Station, PLAZA Premium Wien provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a terrace and a bar. The hotel features a sauna and an ATM. At the hotel each room includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. At PLAZA Premium Wien all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. There is an on-site snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Romanian at the reception, staff are always on hand to help. Wien Westbahnhof Railway Station is 4.2 km from PLAZA Premium Wien, while Schönbrunn Palace is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Vienna International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Hampton by Hilton Vienna Messe
description: Hampton by Hilton Vienna Messe, a new hotel presented in style of Hampton's new generation, offers 192 Rooms, free breakfast, meeting facilities (23 sqm) and a fitness area on the 7th Floor. The hotel is situated next to the Exhibition Center "Read Messe", the Football Stadio "Ernst Happel Stadium" and the famous "Prater" (entertainment area). Public transports are reachable in a few minutes walking distance. A public garage is situated directly at the hotel.Hilton

name: Pension Dr. Geissler
description: Pension Dr. Geissler enjoys a central location in a side street of Vienna’s city centre. Situated in a typical Viennese building, it offers traditionally furnished rooms with a private bathroom and cable TV. Guests can benefit from the proximity to the famous St. Stephens’s Cathedral which can be reached within a 10-minute walk. Schwedenplatz Metro Station is only a minutes' walk. Trams 1 and 2, airport shuttles and boats to Bratislava also leave from there. The Danube Canal with its cafes and bars is a 5-minute walk away. A public pool on a boat and artificial beach bars can also be found there. Boat trips to Bratislava are also available on the canal.

name: Das Tigra Hotel
description: This family-run hotel offers a very central location in a quiet street in the heart of Vienna, just a 10-minute walk away from Saint Stephen’s Cathedral. The spacious and modern rooms and suites of Hotel Das Tigra are air-conditioned and feature satellite TV, a minibar, safe, and a bathroom. In the morning you can enjoy a rich breakfast buffet with many typically Viennese dishes. Famous Viennese sights such as the State Opera, the Hofburg Imperial Palace, the Burg Theatre and the Graben, Kohlmarkt and Kärntner Strasse shopping streets can be easily reached in short walks. The Herrengasse Underground Station (line U3) is only a 3-minute walk from the hotel. In 1773, Mozart and his father lived in a small apartment in the historical part of the hotel building, which dates from the 16th century, when they were invited to perform in front of the Empress Maria Theresia at Schönbrunn Palace. At the façade to the left of the hotel entrance, you can see a memorial plaque commemorating Mozart’s first stay in Vienna.

name: Hotel Markus Sittikus Salzburg
description: Hotel Markus Sittikus Salzburg is a modern and charming family-run 4-star hotel situated in a peaceful area, a 3-minute walk from the Mirabell Palace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout this non-smoking hotel. The tastefully furnished rooms are individually decorated and feature a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom. At Hotel Markus Sittikus Salzburg, guests can relax in the garden and enjoy drinks in the inviting bar. A rich breakfast buffet is available each morning. Many sights such as the Mirabell Garden, as well as the Congress Centre are only a few steps away. The historical centre can easily be reached within 700 metres and Salzburg Main Railway Station is just 500 metres from the hotel. The Markus Sittikus can be reached from Salzburg Airport in 25 minutes by public bus. The Kongresshaus Bus Stop (line 2) is only a 2-minute walk away. A public garage is about 200 metres away and offers reduced prices for hotel guests. The staff will be pleased to book excursions and sightseeing trips, where guests will be picked up at the hotel. The SalzburgCard can be bought on site.

name: Levy's Rooms & Breakfast
description: Levy's Rooms & Breakfast is only a 2-minute walk from Salzburg Main. All rooms at Levy's Rooms are modern furnished. Guests enjoy various amenities such as a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and free WiFi. Breakfast is served in the neighboring building "Levy's Breakfast & Hangout"

name: Mercure Salzburg City
description: Quietly located in the heart of Mozart city, the 4-star Mercure Salzburg City hotel welcomes you, whether you are exploring Salzburg historic Old Town, or visiting the Festival or the Exhibition Center. The hotel is easily accessible by public transport or car, and has a seminar area, outdoor parking, and parking garage. The Le Sel restaurant serves local and international specialties.accorhotels.com

name: Bergland Hotel
description: Family-run since 1912, the non-smoking, adults-only Bergland Hotel offers a quiet location in the centre of Salzburg, only a 10-minute walk from Mirabell Palace, the Congress Centre, and the main train station, and a 15-minute walk from the Old Town. Free WiFi is available. The Bergland’s rooms are individually furnished and feature spacious bathrooms. They are decorated with paintings from the art-loving owner’s private collection, but also with some of his own works.

name: Dorint City-Hotel Salzburg
description: Centrally located, the Dorint City-Hotel Salzburg offers holidaymakers and business travelers an ideal starting point for an unforgettable stay in the city of Mozart. The Dorint Hotel with its 139 modern rooms is very popular with business travelers due to its proximity to the exhibition center and congress center as well as to the airport and train station. The Dorint City-Hotel Salzburg is also ideally located for a city trip, since all of Salzburg's sights are within walking distance of the hotel. Particularly noteworthy are the Salzburg Cathedral, the Hohensalzburg Fortress, Mozart's birthplace and Getreidegasse, probably the most famous street in the city. Our 6 event and conference rooms offer you enough space to accommodate up to 250 people. We look forward to your visit in Salzburg! Your team at the Dorint City-Hotel Salzburg Standard double room with bath / toilet: Our comfortable hotel rooms have high quality beds, flat screen TV, bathroom, hairdryer, minibar, free WiFi and bathroom with bathtub! Partly equipped with air conditioning! Costs on site: Free: parking in front of the house, city maps, brochures, WiFi fees for: garage € 15.00 per day, pets € 10.00 per dayVRBO

name: Hotel Max 70
description: Comfort Plus: The MAX Comfort Plus room has everything you need for a comfortable stay. It can accommodate 1 to 3 people. The business traveler is in good hands here as the city traveler. All rooms have the comfort that today's guest expects - modern design paired with functionality. Amenities such as a coffee machine, kettle and fridge are available. The bathroom with shower and separate toilet is spacious and comfortable. All rooms are non-smoking and have air conditioning. The trendy Hotel Max70 is located in Salzburg-Maxglan. Together with the associated Hotel Junior - a few meters away - we offer you the perfect retreat during your stay in the city of Mozart. Whether coming from the airport, the motorway or the train station, we can be reached directly and easily using public transport. Stroll into the historic center in about 30 minutes, past restaurants with their quaint guest gardens, a variety of shops and the Stiegl brewery. Or simply take the number 1 bus, which stops right in front of the Max70, to the old town to Mozart's birthplace, to Getreidegasse and to the Festspielhaus.  Costs on site: Please note that we have prepayment, i. H. You pay on arrival.VRBO

name: Airporthotel Salzburg - Hotel am Salzburg Airport
description: This small and charming hotel is the only hotel located directly at Salzburg Airport. The conveniently located Airporthotel Salzburg is only 100 metres from the arrival hall and can be reached in a 2-minute walk. The bright, non-smoking are equipped with every modern comfort and offer 4-star amenities for all travellers, including room service for drinks. The fairground and the casino can be reached in about a 5-minute drive. All sights and attractions of Salzburg and the surrounding area can be reached quickly and easily. Airporthotel Salzburg is perfectly connected by public transport to the city centre, which is about 3.5 km away. The bus providing direct connection to the Old Town stops a 2-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Drei Kreuz
description: Hotel Drei Kreuz is located in the centre of Salzburg, only a 10-minute walk from the Old Town. Free WiFi is provided in all areas and private parking spaces are available on site for a surcharge. This family-run hotel offers spacious, individually furnished rooms. All of them are non-smoking. The restaurant next door serves a wide range of Austrian, Italian and Indian dishes. It is open daily except Wednesdays. 2 bus stops are very close to the Drei Kreuz Hotel. The train station, the airport, and the Salzburg Congress Centre can be reached with a direct bus line. Several restaurants and shops, as well as 2 big supermarkets, are only a few steps away from the Drei Kreuz. The Kapuzinerberg hill is also very close.

name: Hotel Sacher Salzburg
description: Opened in 1866, the privately owned Hotel Sacher Salzburg is a grand, historic hotel which combines timeless elegance and tradition with highest standard of service. It is centrally located on the banks of the Salzach River with magnificent and unique views of the historic old town and Hohensalzburg Fortress. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire hotel. All rooms and suites are furnished in an individual fashion and offer state-of-the-art facilities. Each one has been personally decorated by Mrs. Elisabeth Gürtler, the hotel's owner, with a great love of details. Furnishings include original paintings and silk wallpapers. All rooms offer air conditioning, a minibar, and bathrobes. The restaurant Zirbelzimmer, whose wooden panelling and elaborately carved ceilings are unique in Salzburg, is a popular meeting place for gourmets. Restaurant Roter Salon is located on the footpath along the Salzach River and offers beautiful views of the old town and restaurant Salzachgrill serves barbecue specialties. The famous Café Sacher Salzburg serves the original Sacher cake in a typical Austrian coffee house ambience with an elegant touch. Sacher Bar serves a wide range of drinks accompanied by live piano music.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Goldener Adler
description: Your Best Western Plus Hotel Goldener Adler in Innsbruck - history and life since 1390! Welcome to one of the oldest hotels in Europe, preserved in its historical form. "Grüss Gott" in the oldest restaurant of the imperial-royal Innsbruck. Here you are right in the most central location: traditional cuisine, international delights in our restaurant, the most central first-class hotel in town with lots of charm and every comfort, open 365 days a year! Dear holidaymakers, city holidaymakers, business travellers, trade fair and congress visitors, city dwellers, gourmets, opera and festival fans. follow us to the hotel, the restaurant or the Cafe Bar Maria von Burgund. Family-run in a central location, in the middle of Innsbruck's old town, surrounded by history and tradition. Consistent improvements and thoughtful renovations have made the hotel and restaurant what it is today: the most central hotel and restaurant in Innsbruck with a great price-performance ratio, focused on quality and cordiality. Many sights such as the "Goldenes Dachl", the Hofburg, the Hofkirche and other places of interest can be reached with just a few steps. The proximity to the Congress Innsbruck as well as to the university hospital and many shopping possibilities make the Golden Eagle the perfect city domicile for holidaymakers, business travellers, trade fair and congress visitors. The family-run hotel in Innsbruck, known for charming hospitality and attentive staff. Our reception team will be happy to help you organize tickets, guided tours, Tyrolean evenings and all other information and events. We are at your disposal 365 days a year. Sincerely, your family Hackl with 100 busy hands and 50 smiling faces. Renewal of drinking water pipes in Innsbruck's old town may temporarily cause noise during the day.bestwestern.com

name: Alpenpark Resort Superior
description: The 4-star superior Alpenpark Resort is located in the centre of Seefeld in Tyrol and features a family spa with a hot tub, an outdoor pool, and a water park with 3 slides. The Alpenpark offers a games area, a baby club with child-care services 5 days a week, an activities club for children, children's and baby buffets, a separate dining room for kids, and a garden with playground, bouncing castle and a trampoline. Prams, baby bathtubs, bottle warmers, high chairs and baby phones are provided. Tyrolean and international cuisine, as well as a varied breakfast buffet, can be enjoyed in the restaurant. Half-board includes breakfast and dinner. You can park your car for free on site. An underground car park is available at an additional cost and on prior reservation.

name: Alpenlove - Adult Spa Hotel
description: The Alpenhotel.fall in Love is situated in the centre of Seefeld, offering wellness and medical facilities at 1,200 metres above sea level. Underground parking is available at a surcharge, and free WiFi is available. The panoramic Black Crystal spa area covers 2,300m² and offers a variety of spa and therapeutic facilities including beauty treatments, an indoor swimming pool, a relaxation room, a sun terrace, and a fitness room. A sauna and a Roman steam bath will warm you on cold days. The spacious rooms of the Alpenhotel.fall in Love all come with a balcony, a safe, a hairdryer, and a make-up mirror. The rooms are furnished either in modern or traditional style. International specialties and Tyrolean delicacies, fine wines and elaborate deserts are served in the restaurant. The Dark Temptation restaurant and bar offers evening entertainment with music and dancing.

name: Bergresort Seefeld
description: Quietly located close to the centre of Seefeld, this 4-star superior hotel is surrounded by a 15,000 m² garden with beautiful mountain views. Bergresort Seefeld offers a 1,400 m² spa and wellness area with a sauna area, a Kneipp basin, an indoor pool, and a heated outdoor pool. The garden also features a natural swimming pond. The in-house fitness room is equipped with state-of-the-art exercise equipment. Bergresort Seefeld also offers a gourmet restaurant with a vinotheque. Parking is available free of charge.

name: Das Kaltschmid - Familotel Tirol
description: Located in the pedestrian zone in the centre of Seefeld, DAS Kaltschmid features 2 gourmet restaurants and a large spa area. The indoor pool offers panoramic mountain views. DAS Kaltschmid offers free private parking. Spa facilities include saunas, a steam bath, and a hot tub. There is also a modern gym. Table tennis and billiards can be played at DAS Kaltschmid Since December 2017, The Happy Club kid's club includes extra benefits for children: breakfast, lunch at the Happy Club, cake/ice cream in restaurant "Am Kurpark", dinner and soft drinks, Child care 6 days a week at least 50 hours and Happy performances 6 times a week, Happy SPA with baby pool and children's pool with water slide, There are live music and dance evenings.

name: Das Gutenbrunn Thermen & Sporthotel
description: Directly connected to the Römertherme Spa via a private covered pathway, Das Gutenbrunn Thermen & Sporthotel is a protected historic building that was once a residence of Beethoven. Free WiFi is available on site. The spacious, individually decorated rooms have a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Bathrobes are at guests' disposal. The rooms and the public areas feature Art Nouveau elements. Guests of the Das Gutenbrunn Thermen & Sporthotel can also relax in the lounge which features an original glass roof.

name: Inntaler Hof
description: A short distance from skiing, cycling, and more, this family-friendly vacation home lets you experience it all. There's convenient covered onsite parking, so you can leave your vehicle behind and head out to Seefeld Ski Area and Peace Bell in the Alpes, just a short walk away. Relax by the communal pool or sip a drink in the garden of this 753-sq-ft vacation home, which also features a porch or lanai and a fitness center. For a change of scenery, come inside and try your hand at table tennis, or enjoy the Internet, cable/satellite TV, and stereo. As you settle into this 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental, you'll find a BBQ grill and a fireplace. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer and towels. The kitchen is stocked with a refrigerator. And you can even travel light because you'll have a dryer.VRBO

name: Hotel zum Hirschen
description: The family-run Hotel zum Hirschen is located in the pedestrian zone of Zell am See, only a 2-minute walk from the lake. It offers award-winning cuisine and free Wi-Fi access. A rich breakfast buffet with many regional products is served in the morning. Half-board includes a 3-course menu with a salad buffet. The restaurant was awarded 2 toques by Gault Millau. The spa area features a sauna, an infrared cabin, Kneipp baths, a dive pool, and a relaxation room. Massages and beauty treatments can be booked at the reception. A massage room is available. As a guest of the Hirschen hotel you enjoy free entrance to all public outdoor pools around Lake Zell. Many leisure activities are available in every season. Staff are happy to provide you with information. Your car can be parked in the lockable garage right next to Hotel zum Hirschen.

name: Dollinger
description: Family-run for nearly 500 years, the Dollinger is set at the foot of the Nordkette Mountains in the northern part of Innsbruck. It offers limited free parking, surcharged parking situated nearby and a breakfast buffet. All rooms provide bathroom amenities, satellite flat-screen TVs and a safe, as well as free Wi-Fi access. The restaurant of the Dollinger serves Austrian and especially Tyrolean cuisine either indoors, or in the beautiful garden, shaded by old chestnut trees. The Dollinger will organize a free ski bus in winter and a hiking bus in summer. The Inn Valley Bicycle Trail goes past the hotel, as are numerous hiking tracks. The Innsbruck Old Town, the famous Golden Roof and the Court Church are 1.5 km from the Dollinger and can be easily reached either within a 20-minute walk or a few minutes by bus. The Hungerburgbahn, a funicular leading to the Alpine Zoo of Innsbruck, is nearby.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Innsbruck
description: Located in the heart of the Capital of the Alps, AC Hotel Innsbruck is situated close to the Main Train Station and the old town. The first AC Hotel in Austria is also the perfect choice to explore the city on foot or as a base for fantastic Skiing and Hiking in the surrounding area. Originally built in 1972 for the Winter Olympic Games this landmark hotel in Innsbruck has been completely refurbished and upgraded with all 187 rooms enjoying breathtaking views of the Alps. Enjoy our signature breakfast or relax after a day on the slopes in our AC Lounge where bold lines, wooden textures and sleek decorations compliment your business meeting or social gatherings with AC Hotels’ signature creative atmosphere. We invite you to come and experience what happens when Austrian hospitality meets Mediterranean flair. With great connections, be it on foot, by car or indeed train, the AC Hotel Innsbruck is the ideal base for either exploring Tyrol or simply enjoying the delights of the city.Marriott

name: St Georg
description: This stylish country hotel enjoys a very quiet location close to the centre of Zell am See and only 300 metres away from the City Express Cable Car. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. You can enjoy fine Austrian cuisine in the restaurant and selected drinks in the bar. Hotel St. Georg offers elegant rooms and suites in the individual ambience of a Salzburg country estate. The spa area consists of an indoor pool with counter current system, a Finnish sauna, a bio sauna, an infrared cabin, and a sun bed and massages (both available at an additional cost). The restaurant also features a wine cellar and a vinotheque. In summer you can also have breakfast on the sunny terrace. The restaurant is open in winter. In summer guests can reach surrounding restaurants on foot. Hotel St. Georg offers a green fee reduction of 30% at the nearby golf course.

name: Wellnesshotel Schönruh - Adults only
description: Rooms Stay in one of 101 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and ski storage. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you a stay at Wellnesshotel Schönruh - Adults Only in Seefeld in Tirol, you'll be next to a golf course, within a 5-minute walk of Seefeld Ski Area and Golfacadamy Seefeld. This 4-star hotel is 19.8 mi (31.9 km) from Garmisch-Partenkirchen Ski Resort and 0.6 mi (0.9 km) from Rosshuette Cable Car. Dining Satisfy your appetite for dinner at the hotel's restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations This property is closed from October 15 2023 to December 22 2023 (dates subject to change). The property is closed between March 26 and May 17. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 3.50 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 15 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 25.00 per person Airport shuttle fee: EUR 120.00 per vehicle (roundtrip, maximum occupancy 4) Pet fee: EUR 12.00 per pet, per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Hotel Salzburgerhof
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 69 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, designer toiletries, and hair dryers. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. After a day on the slopes, you can relax in one of the 2 spa tubs. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, ski storage, and a fireplace in the lobby. The complimentary ski shuttle makes getting to the slopes a breeze. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Zell am See? This hotel has 753 square feet (70 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite. Property Location A stay at Hotel Salzburgerhof places you in the heart of Zell am See, steps from Lake Zell and 2 minutes by foot from Zeller See Beach. This 5-star hotel is 11.2 mi (18 km) from Saalbach-Hinterglemm Ski Resort and 0.2 mi (0.4 km) from Zell am See Leisure Centre. Dining Enjoy a meal at Salzburger Stube or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 11:30 AM. Renovations The property is closed in November. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city and collected at the property. This tax is adjusted seasonally and might not apply year round. Other exemptions or reductions might apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 November - 14 May, EUR 0.00 per person, per night for adults; EUR 0.00 per night for guests aged 6-14 years old. This tax does not apply to children under 6 years of age. name: Das Hotel Eden
description: Surrounded by a generously designed park landscape directly opposite Seefeld's pedestrian zone, Das Hotel Eden features a spacious spa area, a beauty centre, and free WiFi. The heated outdoor pool offers views of the surrounding mountains. Located amidst the scenic Tyrolean mountains, all rooms at the Hotel Eden feature a balcony and offer panoramic views. All rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free wired internet access. A notebook can also be rented at the reception. In summer the property rents E-Bikes at a surcharge. At the Seebach Restaurant, you can enjoy delicious meals, or try regional delicacies and wine from a well-assorted wine list at Adam’s Bistro Bar with live music. The half-board offer includes homemade cakes in the afternoon, a 5-course dinner, and once per week a theme dinner buffet.

name: Q! Hotel Maria Theresia
description: The Q! Hotel Maria Theresia is located right in the centre of Kitzbühel, only a few steps away from the Hahnenkammbahn Cable Car. WiFi access is provided free of charge. The restaurant serves traditional Tyrolean cuisine as well as modern dishes. The half-board arrangement includes a 4-course dinner with a starter, soup, meat or vegetarian main course, and a dessert. In the morning, a varied breakfast buffet is offered. The Maria Theresia Hotel also has an elegant fireplace lounge with a bar. Spa facilities include various free saunas and a steam bath. A selection of beauty and massage treatments is available at an additional cost. The Golfclub Schwarzsee Golf Course is 4.6 km away and guests receive a 20% discount on the green fee. Golf packages as well as the Golf-Alpin Card are available on request at the hotel. The Golfclub Kaps is 1.4 km away, the Golfplatz Rasmushof Golf Course is within 1.1 km and the Golfplatz Eichenheim Golf Course is 2.7 km from the hotel. Many restaurants, bars and shops are very close, and the cable car to the Kitzbüheler Horn is also close by.

name: Hotel Grüner Baum
description: Only a few minutes’ walk away from the lakeshore and the cable cars, this family-run hotel is centrally located in the pedestrian zone of Zell am See. Hotel Grüner Baum offers rooms and apartments with free Wi-Fi access, that are scattered around the hotel grounds. Most rooms have a balcony with views of the Schmittenhöhe. There is a free internet terminal in the lounge. The property also features an underground car park and a parking lot available for extra charges. The spa area features 2 saunas and a relaxation room. It can be used free of charge, while bathrobes are provided at an additional cost. Classic Austrian cuisine and specialities from the in-house butcher shop await you at Hotel Grüner Baum’s à la carte restaurant. In summer you can also dine in the beer garden. A half board can be arranged. Greens Pub and the Greens XL cocktail bar offer cool music and trendy drinks. A fitness centre is 300 metres away, and a sun bed 100 metres. Massages can be booked at a nearby hotel. Guests of Hotel Grüner Baum receive a 30% green fee reduction at the Zell am See-Kaprun golf course (36 holes). Ski passes are available directly at the hotel, and ski equipment can be hired next door.

name: Krumers Alpin - Your Mountain Oasis
description: Located a 10-minute walk from the centre of Seefeld and 150 metres from the Rosshütte cable car, the Krumers Alpin – Your Mountain Oasis is a 4-star superior hotel featuring a renovated 3,500 m² spa area with an all-year 240 m² large indoor and outdoor pool, a ski storage with a ski boot dryer, 4 conference rooms, an underground car park and car ports. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. The Krumers Alpin – Your Mountain Oasis includes a large sauna area with a Finnish sauna, a laconium, an aroma-infused steam room, an Alpine herb steam room, an ice room with ice fountain, a tepidarium with heated stone loungers, 2 solariums, and a gym with TechnoGym and Precor equipment and an exercise room. A wide range of massage and beauty treatments is available as well. The spacious rooms include a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar, and a bathroom with hairdryer. All rooms include a bag with bathrobes, slippers, and bathing towels. The generous half board includes a breakfast buffet, cakes in the afternoon, a 5-course dinner menu or a choice of dishes or buffet with vegetarian, vegan and allergen-free dishes. The cuisine is a contemporary interpretation of Austrian classics and international favourites. In summer, several hiking and biking trails, including theme trails, such as the Mental Power Trail, e-bike and mountain bike trails and a roller ski trail. Several lakes with public bathing beaches and golf clubs are in the vicinity.

name: At The Park Hotel
address: Kaiser Franz-Ring 5, 2500 Baden bei Wien, Niederosterreich
description: Located right in the Kurpark in the centre of Baden, only 200 metres from the casino and the Römertherme Thermal Spa, the At the Park Hotel offers a lobby bar, a spa area with a sauna, and a fitness centre. Free WiFi is available. The rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV, wooden or carpeted floors, and a bathroom. They offer views of the park or the Haus der Kunst Museum. Some rooms come with air conditioning and balcony. The double beds are fitted with 2 separate mattresses. The terrace overlooks the park and the casino. In fine weather, breakfast as well as coffee and cakes are served there. Hotel At the Park features 6 modern seminar rooms, an in-house vinotheque, and a wine tasting room.

name: Hotel Neue Post
description: Set in the Ziller Valley, Hotel Neue Post is located in the centre of Mayrhofen. The spa area includes an indoor pool. The Zillertal Congress Europahaus is 100 metres away. The traditionally furnished rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV as well as the Sky-Bundesliga channel, and a bathroom with hairdryer and make-up mirror. The Neue Post’s spa area can be used free of charge. It includes various saunas, an infrared cabin, a steam bath, and a fitness room. Half-board includes a large breakfast buffet, and a 5-course dinner with a salad buffet. Special menus for children, diabetics and vegetarians are prepared on request. The bar Posttenne features live music in the main season.Wine tasting is possible at the wine cellar on site. Guests can relax on the sun terrace. A ski storage room with a ski boot dryer and free private parking are available on site. The free ski bus to the Zillertal 3000 ski area stops right outside, and the stop of the ski bus to the Hintertux Glacier is a 2-minute walk away. A public swimming pool is 400 metres away.
